casebody.data:
No. 10-5189. Brandon Bloss, Petitioner v. Gerald L. Rozum, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Somerset, et al. 562 U.S. 908, 131 S. Ct. 256,

178 L. Ed. 2d 170,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7325. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
